# Indexing ğŸ“‡

## What are Indexes?

Data structures that speed up queries.

## Types

| Type | Use Case |
|------|----------|
| B-tree | Default, range queries |
| Hash | Equality lookups |
| Composite | Multi-column |

## Best Practices

- Index WHERE clause columns
- Consider selectivity
- Don't over-index

> ğŸ¯ Right indexes = fast queries!

slides.content:
# Query Patterns ğŸ“Š

## Avoid

- SELECT *
- Functions in WHERE on indexed columns
- Unnecessary JOINs
- Missing WHERE clauses

## Prefer

- Select only needed columns
- Appropriate indexes
- Limit results when possible
- Use EXPLAIN

> ğŸ’¡ Understand your execution plan!
